title: FS: Old Mill SLer, Polar Bears
author: Rob D.

posts.post_title: FS: Old Mill SLer, Polar Bears
posts.post_content:
Prices are delivered within the United States. Regular PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment.

Old Mill southern leaguer Lafitte, SGC 10/1, $49
Polar Bear Gray, PSA 3 (MK), $47
Polar Bear Burch, raw, $19
Polar Bear Jennings, raw, $59
Polar Bear Bliss, raw, $29

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes: 

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions or requests for larger scans.[/URL]

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com [/URL]
